com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

Interface IDataAction<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>,STORAGE extends IDataStorage<DESC,DATA>,QUERYRESULT extends IQueryResult<DESC,DATA>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBeanAction, ITupleAction

    public interface IDataAction<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>,STORAGE extends IDataStorage<DESC,DATA>,QUERYRESULT extends IQueryResult<DESC,DATA>>
    Defines the operation to be performed when a continuous query has been satisfied.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action(java.util.List<DATA> localData, java.util.List<QUERYRESULT> remoteData, java.lang.Object listenerKey)
      Take an arbitrary action based on the given application data, which is the result of a continuous query created one of ISharedDataPlatform's addRemoteListener() methods.

    • Method Detail

      • action

        void action(java.util.List<DATA> localData,
          java.util.List<QUERYRESULT> remoteData,
          java.lang.Object listenerKey)
        Take an arbitrary action based on the given application data, which is the result of a continuous query created one of ISharedDataPlatform's addRemoteListener() methods.
        Parameters:
        localData - the data from the local platform that resulted from the query also applied on the remote platform.
        remoteData - results of remote query
        listenerKey - the key that was returned by the add listener call, which is associated with this data.
